name: UPatternTool_GridSettings
doc:
Settings for Grid Patterns in the Pattern Tool
TODO: maybe we can just re-use UPatternTool_LinearSettings for this??

SpacingX: Spacing Technique used to distribute Pattern Elements along the Main axis
CountX: Number of Pattern Elements to place along the Main axis
StepSizeX: Fixed Increment used to place Pattern Elements along the Main axis
ExtentX: Length/Extent of Pattern falong the Main Axis
bCenteredX: If true, Pattern is centered at the Origin along the Main axis, otherwise Pattern starts at the Origin
SpacingY: Spacing Technique used to distribute Pattern Elements along the Secondary axis
CountY: Number of  Pattern Elements to place along the Secondary axis
StepSizeY: Fixed Increment used to place Pattern Elements along the Secondary axis
ExtentY: Length/Extent of Pattern falong the Secondary Axis
bCenteredY: If true, Pattern is centered at the Origin along the Secondary axis, otherwise Pattern starts at the Origin
